backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing access-controlled user profiles and CRUD operations for hospital visit entries with ownership checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of major frontend components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, themes, and base layout rules for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication, profile setup, navigation, and entry editing state.
frontend/src/components/visit/MyEntriesL: Displays and manages the user's visit entries with sorting, delete confirmation, and edit triggers.
frontend/src/components/visit/VisitEntry: Form for creating or editing visit entries with validation, manual date input, calendar picker, and success handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles and visit entries using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with a clinical color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, plugins, and component styling based on CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and lists implemented features for a patient-visit data entry app, including form fields, validation, theming, listing, editing, and date/manual entry support. Serves as the canonical state tracking file for build planning.
